article_node.title: Johnson and Johnson, WH Smiths and Disney: Trending Stocks
article_node.summary: The brief covers earnings and guidance updates from major retailers Walmart, Home Depot, and Target, noting mixed results and strategic moves amid inflation and tariff pressures. It highlights the upcoming Jackson Hole symposium where Fed Chair Powell’s remarks could signal policy direction. Trending tickers include Johnson & Johnson’s U.S. manufacturing expansion, WH Smith’s share plunge after an accounting error, and Disney’s launch of an ESPN streaming service. The segment also mentions the Trump administration’s potential stake in Intel as part of the Chips Act.
